name: 科學文獻探討（一）
description: (1) 探索科學文獻中，關於當代化學製程、分析方法、合成步驟，以及化學教育的前言發展。(2) 以結合文獻閱讀、口頭報告、書面重點整理，加上課堂問答的實作形式，來幫助學生探究當代化學相關的最新見解。
goals: Help students to develop the ability in conducting a good scientific presentation.
Help students to develop a procedure in accessing a scientific journal article.
Learning the update development in chemistry and chemical education.
syllabus:
(1) Arranging students' presentation schedule.

(2) Providing the guideline for conducting a professional scientific presentation.

(3) Providing the logistics of carrying out oral presentations.

(4) Managing class participation at each Q&A section.
